title: Yen Bears Are Everywhere as Currency Heads Toward 160 Per Dollar
description: Capital outflows, BOJ’s gradual tightening pace are keeping the yen under pressure.
content: Capital outflows, BOJ’s gradual tightening pace are keeping the yen under pressure.
